comments.author: fro.8967
comments.body:
Lawton Campbell.8517:

Yeah, the big issue is that the map tiles need to be regenerated, and the program that does that is a bit … interesting.

Is there any chance of just getting a high-res JPEG or something of the new full WvW map? The desert borderland itself has surfaced, but the full map including EBG would be awesome to have.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
smiley.1438:

My guess: not before 23-10-2015 (well, perhaps a beta)

Yeah, the big issue is that the map tiles need to be regenerated, and the program that does that is a bit … interesting.

I’ll look into turning on /v2/wvw/objectives — it has actual data for both new and old (and even Edge of the Mists) stuff.

comments.author: Gudradain.3892
comments.body:
Would it be “ok” if I was to obtained a copy of the new wvw map via the GW2.dat file in order to start building a new live map before the expansion launch?

I would kinda prefer to do the coding before the expansion to be able to enjoy the expansion when it’s realeased…

comments.author: smiley.1438
comments.body: My guess: not before 23-10-2015 (well, perhaps a beta)

comments.author: Gudradain.3892
comments.body: Anyone know when the API for the new WvW map will be release so we can start building live map website?
